"},{"id":26,"type":"Hijacked - My account was abused by hijacker","appellant":"76561198258673440 (Faze Syaf)","alts":null,"description":"Hi I'm trying to remove the FoG scammer tag from my current account.  Eveything start from my old account currently name "76561198203099210" by the hijacker [url]http://files.f-o-g.eu/372deg18604g3dd9581g86f7b49eddgg[/url]. What happen is I was trading a knife with this guy who end up to be a scammer and half way through the process I found that I was requried to wait for 7 days because I've changed my steam password. So I require him to wait for a 7 days before I could transfer him the knife for inspection as he wanted to know weather it's a real or the duplica. He then refuse to wait and he wanted to find a middle man to do the job for him but I refuses his offer and next thing I know my account was being hijacked and I couldn't log into it and the reason I know it is the same guy that hijacked my account is becuase he uses the same name as the trader. After what happen, I created a new account and try to emailed my old account to ask him to return my account but he started using my new steam account name to scamme people and probably that's the reason my current account is being mark as a FoG scammer. Hope this will be resolve ASAP. Thanks","evidence":"http://files.f-o-g.eu/372deg18604g3dd9581g86f7b49eddgg http://files.f-o-g.eu/13bga112f198gd9cc30fg9fe824cd2c5","assignee_id":null,"state_id":6,"views":29,"locked":1,"creator_id":96,"modificator_id":96,"created_at":"13.09.2016 19:25:03","updated_at":"2016-09-13 20:19:35","state":"Invalid","assignee":"

I have been put as an Alt of : | steamname: [⇄]Wayne Buying Backpacks $$$ |  steam3ID: [U:1:271643288] | steamID32: STEAM_0:0:135821644 | steamID64: http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198231909016 | customURL: http://steamcommunity.com/id/big_bossbuyingskins |  steamrep: http://steamrep.com/profiles/76561198231909016 I have no association with him. I was impersonated him quite a while ago, and if i do i need evidence to prove it, then i will rest my case.  I am a little angry that Tio Refused to talk to me.  I asked for the adress of this buisness/ who owns it for pressing charges (Now I know its in San Francisco!)  I NEED Evidence that connects me to the wayne impersonator.  I Have scammed NO ONE!  You refused to actually read the steamrep appeal and jumped to conclusions. I Bought the jfriend account off my friend a few years back, when it had the VAC-Ban, not the scammers account which i think you had mis inturpreted! ","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":6,"views":61,"locked":1,"creator_id":204,"modificator_id":204,"created_at":"02.12.2016 20:54:58","updated_at":"2016-12-02 21:22:39","state":"Invalid","assignee":"

"},{"id":95,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198261911071 (Endangered Poot Bird)","alts":null,"description":"[i]I`m banned from hell`s gaming now permanently and hell`s gaming was my favorite server and i was 10 years old back then where my instincts got the better of me (this is when before i started taking my medication i have a lot better control now) and i want to go back in i loved everybody everything was going great up until stick man showed up he challenged people too heavy box him so out of what i did i accepted if i won id get an unusual bot if i lost i would have too surrender almost all my hats and taunts (which put altogether would probably cost more than that unusual) so when i lost out of pure instinct i lost control of my body and instinct took over and made me disconnect from the server i realized that was my worst mistake of my life (other than being born thanks dad!) please Gaben please appeal my ban PLZ! i love the server and i have very good and fun memories out of it like when i was still a gibus and made it to round 2 of a fashion contest and the time where all blus switched to red and spawncamped me until other people arrived and well i just want those happy times back man you know those times where you feel good to be back in a place for a long time? well... i would like those feelings back again and have fun like any 11 year-old on tf2 and i dont really have a mic i just want fun and memories back please un- ban me its my chrismas wish i would really love the feelings back when i was 10 and first played with no clue of anything in tf2 was and before i became a p2p please appeal my ban im doing the best i can with my medicine helping me i want everybody too have fun[/i]​","evidence":"https://files.f-o-g.eu/3a6aef40bfgaa1c5940g84de4age1032 ","assignee_id":null,"state_id":6,"views":52,"locked":1,"creator_id":125,"modificator_id":125,"created_at":"04.12.2016 22:08:30","updated_at":"2016-12-04 22:18:26","state":"Invalid","assignee":"
Unassigned
","last_reply":"
Tio José das Vacas
"},{"id":98,"type":"Wrong Alt - Alternate account is not my account","appellant":"76561198079312018 (kandoer)","alts":null,"description":"Hello FoG, My name is Vincent Bubbert and I live in New Zealand. I noticed I have a 'Scammer' tag on my name. This however seems to be only because I was related to my brothers account through the 'Family Sharing' option on steam. As I am related through this it sees my account as an alternate. I find this unfair, although I do understand you are only trying to protect other users. As my brother has now been banned and disabled my family sharing option, I was wondering if I could get my 'Scammer' tag removed as it has created some obstacles for me when playing Team Fortress 2. I do not know what evidence to provide for this, could you kindly send me an email with the evidence you need from me to help make your decision. Thank you very much for taking your time to read this appeal, I hope it wasnt an inconvenience for you. Kind Reguards, Vincent Bubbert","evidence":"This is my evidence of my brothers account. Please don't hesitate to ask for more, I just don't know what there evidence you need. Thanks https://files.f-o-g.eu/f30f3dgf1003b03cg178bdef15d35e71 ","assignee_id":null,"state_id":6,"views":46,"locked":1,"creator_id":211,"modificator_id":211,"created_at":"09.12.2016 00:20:22","updated_at":"2016-12-09 02:04:21","state":"Invalid","assignee":"

Tio José das Vacas
"},{"id":123,"type":"Mistake - Admin misunderstood evidence or made a mistake","appellant":"76561198193442598 (K1)","alts":null,"description":"I'd like to agree that I did have the same name as said Administrator, "Chride2k8 |LZ| #Sailing". I didn't do any research on said profile, not knowing that it was an Administrator for SteamRep, or one for any site at all. I can admit to having the same alias, the part I beg to differ of, is the "attempted fraud" accusation, as said on my SteamRep profile, which is currently why I have a bad reputation. Though I had the same name as this Admin, (Which I will give a picture of his profile, as well as my previous aliases [I know, I have a really edgy profile]) I did not attempt to commit any fraud, or any other crime involved. My name was the same as this Admin because it was a joke, with a group of friends I play CS:GO with a lot. The joke, or "meme" as we call it, was that we all had changed our names to something similar, and mine just so happened to be "Sailing", while others had "Flying" or "Driving", because we as a group, were all about jokes. My friend Cameron explained that he 'knew' someone that had the name "Sailing" when he saw the rest of the group and I in a TeamSpeak channel, and thought it would be funny if I was replicating that guy. Being as stupid as I am, I changed my name without researching who it was, as well as my picture, because that was a kick to said friends of mine. I'm requesting this appeal and acceptance, because I, myself would not like to be accused wrongfully for my actions, as I will do research before doing anything as even close to stupid as changing my Steam name, like I do every other week. I'd like to thank whoever is or was reading this for their time, as it is a long story, and it is a very stupid occurrence.","evidence":"https://files.f-o-g.eu/fcb5af92177c9e9g3a96g713fgdcdc1c https://files.f-o-g.eu/9cg8f0e9c84d211dc4eccg02cb26e41f https://files.f-o-g.eu/7b073ed7a6000af79178cd4ag16d59b8 ","assignee_id":null,"state_id":6,"views":46,"locked":1,"creator_id":259,"modificator_id":259,"created_at":"17.01.2017 21:37:22","updated_at":"2017-01-18 10:57:12","state":"Invalid","assignee":"
Unassigned
","last_reply":"
Tio José das Vacas

I was impersonating kasper but not anymore. I never scammed anyone check evidence","evidence":"https://files.f-o-g.eu/cfaf5fd942b23fc69ae7bd2d302b6edf https://files.f-o-g.eu/1dfggfc8c49fc64d51cfb43g2cdc76cg","assignee_id":null,"state_id":6,"views":191,"locked":1,"creator_id":251,"modificator_id":251,"created_at":"19.03.2017 06:47:40","updated_at":"2017-03-19 12:32:25","state":"Invalid","assignee":"

"},{"id":160,"type":"Other / another reason ","appellant":"76561198115644413 (Empath'™)","alts":"","description":"Hi again, sorry for making another appeal. I got told it was against steam police, and i didn't know that. I've learned by my mistake. And i'm new to all this, i'm sorry for all this. All i want, is just to get a chance, to being able to trade with people.  This is what i wrote in last Appeal:  Hello FoG Trade. I've for a while ago, bought this account. The person who had this account, said everything was alright with the account, and everything should be what it is. I'm a small trader, and when i logged into csgolounge, it said i was banned. I made some research, and it shows up, that this account has been a scam account i think. So, i don't know what to do now. Is there any possible way to get this account unbanned? I feel scammed, because the guy said this account was in 'full-condition', but it shows up, that it's not. And i can't trade anymore. If you need more information about this account, i can try to find some of it. Have a good day, and i hope you can help me out there. ","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":6,"views":44,"locked":1,"creator_id":348,"modificator_id":348,"created_at":"19.03.2017 10:49:19","updated_at":"2017-03-19 12:30:26","state":"Invalid","assignee":"

BUT this hour THIS BANNED CLOSED EMPTY ACCOUNT reporting me in SteamRep. ЩА | Horse (SR admin) asking: Why you are reporting yourself? Alt's reply: :D ? 1 DAY LATER... This report is closed. ЩА | Horse: This is pointless, you are reported yourself. This situation is a little bit strange, isn't it? ","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":6,"views":184,"locked":1,"creator_id":357,"modificator_id":357,"created_at":"27.03.2017 21:50:16","updated_at":"2017-03-27 21:59:27","state":"Invalid","assignee":"

Thank you very much for taking your time to read this ban appeal and I would really appreciate getting unbanned.[/i]​","evidence":"Posting a malicious csgodouble script design to steal money on steam groups (the site has been closed for months now) Proof I did it: http://files.f-o-g.eu/2d9b5e6b10b39903c1cg37599fgg16e4​","assignee_id":null,"state_id":6,"views":52,"locked":1,"creator_id":367,"modificator_id":367,"created_at":"06.04.2017 00:12:52","updated_at":"2017-04-06 20:36:09","state":"Invalid","assignee":"

"},{"id":181,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198157671301 (Marian "1r0nyBG" Ivanov)","alts":"| steamname: BlackCrusaderBG | steam3ID: [U:1:177894207] | steamID32: STEAM_0:1:88947103 | steamID64: http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198138159935 | customURL: http://steamcommunity.com/id/cslngreachwarza32 | steamrep: http://steamrep.com/profiles/76561198138159935","description":"[i]Lets start like this. I just know i was little at ages, i wasn't thinking how bad i am, i wasn't thinking how long others work or trade for their items. I thinking i can change myself and i can be a better person and friendly person.
